text: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has now been spread far too thinly to have any noticeable effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Certain humans started to arise with strong concentrations of mana.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has now been spread far too thinly to have any noticeable effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Certain humans started to arise with strong concentrations of mana. These individuals are known as "Mana-users" and are the only ones capable of wielding magic.

The Mana-users are now the last hope of humanity.

The Mana-users are now the last hope of humanity as well as what threatens our very existence. 

The Mana-users are divided into two factions: the Light and the Dark. Apparently mirroring the ancient order of the world. 

The Light Mana-users are the ones who wish to use their power to help humanity.

The Mana-users are now the last hope of humanity as well as what threatens our very existence. 

The Mana-users are divided into two factions: the Light and the Dark. Apparently mirroring the ancient order of the world.  The Light Mana-users wish to use their power to help humanity, the dark to subdue, control, and bring utter destruction. 

The leader of the Dark faction has accessed a forbidden ability that threatens the fabric of existence.

The Light Mana-users were losing the battle until an ancient one of the Light awoke from millennia of slumber. The ancient one was a being of immense power and knowledge. He was known as the "First Light" and was the first of the Mana-users.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has now been spread far too thinly to have any noticeable effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Certain humans started to arise with strong concentrations of mana. These individuals are known as "Mana-users" and are the only ones capable of wielding significant magic power. 

The Mana-users are now the last hope of humanity as well as what threatens our very existence. 

The Mana-users are divided into two factions: the Light and the Dark. Apparently mirroring the ancient order of the world.  The Light Mana-users wish to use their power to help humanity, the dark to subdue, control, and bring utter destruction. 

The leader of the Dark faction has accessed a forbidden ability that threatens the fabric of existence. The Light Mana-users have now banded together to stop him before it is too late.

The factions clash with many casualties and destruction resulting from their encounter. The leader of the Dark faction had overwhelming power. The Light Mana-users were losing the battle until an ancient one of the Light awoke from millennia of slumber. The ancient one was a being of immense power and knowledge. He was known as the "First Light" and was the first of the Mana-users. 

First Light trained the new Light faction in ancient mana techniques which dramatically increased their power. Finally First Light sacrificed himself to give the Light faction the final edge, and the Dark leader was vanquished. The world has been forever changed, countless have died and civilization approaches a new Horizon where the Light faction guides this new era of healing.
